description: Get ready to shine at BollyFare, where your Bollywood talent takes the spotlight. This is a solo performance in 2 rounds.

rounds.name: Round1: Freestyle
rounds.description: Sing any song of your own choice.
rules: Sing any song of your own choice.

rounds.name: Round2: BollywoodBeats
rounds.description: Selected performers will get a chance to sing any Bollywood song.
rules: Choose any Bollywood song of your own choice and perform it.

summary: Shine with your Bollywood talent in a solo performance with 2 rounds.

description: Get ready to show your love for the retro songs. This is a duet event with two rounds.

rounds.name: Freestyle Round
rounds.description: Participants can choose a song of their own choice.

rounds.name: Second Round
rounds.description: Selected participants will perform retro songs of their own choice.
rules: Compulsory involvement of a girl and a boy.
Participants selected based on judging criteria.

summary: Express your love for retro songs in this duet event with two rounds.

description: Sangam Singing Group Event celebrates the harmony of diverse musical styles. It features two rounds - Freestyle and Classical/Western.

rounds.name: Freestyle Round
rounds.description: Groups must consist of 3 to 6 members. Freedom to choose any genre or style.

rounds.name: Classical/Western Round
rounds.description: Groups must choose either classical or western music for this round.

summary: Celebrate musical harmony with diverse styles in two rounds.

description: An instrumental event where contestants can perform in groups. No limit in the number of members.
summary: Showcase instrumental prowess in a group performance.

description: Celebrate a night filled with rich culture, bringing people together through contemporary music and rich poetry.
summary: Immerse in rich culture through contemporary music and poetry.

description: The most intense rap battle showdown of the year! Fiercest wordsmiths and lyricists compete in a high-energy clash of rhymes.
summary: Engage in intense rap battles with designated rules.

description: Vocalists go head-to-head in a battle of melodies, harmonies, and raw vocal talent. Solo and Battle rounds.
rules: Solo performance showcasing individual vocal abilities.
summary: Vocalists compete head-to-head in solo and battle rounds.

description: Bands compete in the ultimate musical showdown. Showcase your unique sound and wow the audience in this thrilling 30-minute competition.
summary: Bands compete to showcase their unique sound in a thrilling 30-minute showdown.

description: Celebrate the captivating art of throatbass singing. Contestants demonstrate talent, creativity, and vocal prowess.
summary: Demonstrate talent, creativity, and vocal prowess in throatbass singing.

description: Reminisce the good old days with this spoken parlor game. Contestants sing verses based on the Hindi alphabet.
summary: Reminisce with this spoken parlor game singing verses based on the Hindi alphabet.
